Hi, I'm Matt


I am a software developer out of the Greater Nashville Area, TN. Born and raised

I have been a software developer since the age of 24 (born in 1990), but have always been into computers and technology. Since then, I have always had more focus towards C# and SQL development as well as other related technologies to the two.

I have decided to start a blog in this 'wonderful' year of 2020, because... well..., some of us need more things to do these days. Plus, I want to be able to help other developers along the way, so I'm hoping the information I share, can help others out.


Thank you,
Matt Sessions
